page.title: 11Farm survey
page.content: We asked all the members of our class who have farms to fill in the form. These were the questions; 1.How many acres do you farm? 2.What type of farming do you use most of your farm for? 3.How many cattle,sheep,pigs,goats, chickens,other animals do you have? 4.Where do you sell most of your produce? 5.How would you describe the landuse around Coads Green? 6.What is the biggest change in farming in this area over the last few years--if any? We had 6 replies from farms sized 210, 205,200,140,70and 14 acres.The answers to Q5 all agreed that the predominant landuse around Coads Green is mainly grassland for dairy and beef cut for silage and some cereal grown to feed the farmers own animals.
